title: Kasuka na Kanojo
overview: At his previous school, Teacher Akira Kamiyama tried to stop a bullying case and the bullying became his own trauma. Since then, Akira Kamiyama has decided to not get involved if its not absolutely necessary. He then begins teaching at a middle school and moves into a new apartment. Akira then discovers that his apartment also houses a ghost named Akane (Anne Watanabe), who was a teacher before she died. Akira Kamiyama and Akane then solve problems which the middle school students have.
